scripts.format: shopt -s extglob globstar && prettier --config ./.prettierrc.json -c --write ./src/**/*.ts* && shopt -u extglob globstar
scripts.require:firebase_config: [ "${FIREBASE_CONFIG}" ] || { echo 'FIREBASE_CONFIG env not set (app data)' ; exit 1 ; }
scripts.require:firebase_testing: [ "${FIREBASE_TESTING}" ] || { echo 'FIREBASE_TESTING env not set (false or local firestore address without protocol)' ; exit 1 ; }
scripts.build: npm run require:firebase_config && npm run require:firebase_testing && parcel build --no-cache --no-source-maps -d ./dist/build -- "$npm_package_main"
scripts.start: npm run require:firebase_config && npm run require:firebase_testing && parcel serve --no-cache -d ./dist/ -p 5000 -- "$npm_package_main"
